data.title: The Night Circus (Film)
authors: Contributors to The Night Circus Wiki
data.meta_description: The Night Circus is a film currently in pre-production. It is based on Erin Morgenstern's novel of the same name. data.text:
The Night Circus is a film currently in pre-production. It is based on Erin Morgenstern's novel of the same name.

The film rights to The Night Circus were optioned by Summit Entertainment, and is being produced by David Heyman and Jeff Clifford under Heyday Films. Jane Eyre writer, Moira Buffini was hired in February 2012 to write the screenplay, then Annie Baker wrote the most recent screenplay.

In Febuary of 2019, it was announced that Geremy Jasper would direct the film adaptation for Lionsgate.

However, as of November 2020 there is still no confirmation if a film will ever be made.

[]
